title: Three Things Podcast - The Hamilton Hold
itunes:title: Three Things Podcast - The Hamilton Hold
description: “Dr. Bob” Hamilton, proud parent of two Wheaton College graduates and owner of Pacific Ocean Pediatrics shares what it takes to run a small independent medical practice and the background of how his famous baby calming technique, the “Hamilton Hold,” went viral.
content:encoded: “Dr. Bob” Hamilton, proud parent of two Wheaton College graduates and owner of Pacific Ocean Pediatrics shares what it takes to run a small independent medical practice and the background of how his famous baby calming technique, the “Hamilton Hold,” went viral.
